title: MLB Agrees to Pay $185 Million in Settlement (Podcast)
itunes:title: MLB Agrees to Pay $185 Million in Settlement (Podcast)
description:
Host Scarlet Fu talks to Bloomberg Legal News Editor Peter Blumberg about the MLB agreeing to pay $185 million as part of a settlement with minor league ballplayers who say the league has been exploiting them.

The settlement also strikes down an MLB rule that prohibited teams from paying minor leaguers for work beyond the regular season, and requires that all team comply with laws covering minimum wages and overtime.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
